title: Ghosts in Prison - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/1/18
itunes:title: Ghosts in Prison - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/1/18
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Varla Ventura share a story with a caller who saw a ghost during his time working as a prison guard.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
